title: Bug 2529 - Navigator: Open/Close project availability issue
description:
Bug 2529 - Navigator: Open/Close project availability issue (1GFKW5S)

When both P1 and P2 are selected, the Open Project menu item is available, but the Close Project menu item is not.
OB: When both P1 and P2 are selected, the Open Project menu item is available but the Close Project menu item is not visible.
EB: Both the Open Project and Close Project menu items should be available when both P1 and P2 are selected in the Navigator.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the Navigator
2. Select both P1 and P2

Expected behavior:
- Both the Open Project and Close Project menu items should be available when both P1 and P2 are selected in the Navigator.
